about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packs can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • UMC gunship fighter “Tornado” Rank 16
  • Active module “Tornado systems overcharge”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Unique painting “Nocturnal hunter”

Additionally, the pilot receives modules:
  • Combat reboot
  • Engine overcharge
  • Inhibitor swarm
  • Hull restoration system
  • Vernier engines
  • Emergency barrier
  • Adaptive shield
  • Crystal plates

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

For a long time, UMC scientists were engaged in the study of technologies from the special storage of the “Spot” object found in the system SY3176-GIII-A4 on the planetoid “Dead World”. Despite several sabotages in the laboratories, the development of the ship Tornado was completed. One of the features of the ship was the option of full remote control, with the help of technologies found on the planetoid.

Attention! Identical packs can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • UMC gunship fighter “Tornado” Rank 16
  • Active module “Tornado systems overcharge”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Unique painting “Nocturnal hunter”

Additionally, the pilot receives modules:
  • Combat reboot
  • Engine overcharge
  • Inhibitor swarm
  • Hull restoration system
  • Vernier engines
  • Emergency barrier
  • Adaptive shield
  • Crystal plates

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

For a long time, UMC scientists were engaged in the study of technologies from the special storage of the “Spot” object found in the system SY3176-GIII-A4 on the planetoid “Dead World”. Despite several sabotages in the laboratories, the development of the ship Tornado was completed. One of the features of the ship was the option of full remote control, with the help of technologies found on the planetoid.
name: Star Conflict - Tornado (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
